subject: From the Desk of Janet Yelle
body:
From the Desk of Janet Yellen
U.S Department of the Treasury (USDT)
NW Washington, D.C. 20220
Date: January 15, 2024.
Attention Fund Beneficiary,
I Mrs. Janet Yellen the U.S Secretary of the Treasury I hereby write officially today  January 15, 2024 that we have resolved the issue that put your fund on hold for past months and right now you are in position to receive a compensation fund of $1,500,000.00 through the authorized bank.
On that note kindly communicate with the information stated above and submit the stated below information for your fund release verification to be done and once it is done you will receive your fund without any hitches.
Information required for fund release verification:
1.First Name:
2.Middle Name:
3. amount you are expecting
4.Copy of your driver license
5.Current Residence address:
6.Telephone #:
7. Mobile #:
Thanks,
Janet Yellen
U.S Department of the Treasury (USDT)
Phone: + 1 (253) 642-2051. 
My Private email: 
yellenmrsjanet81@gmail.com

subject: Re:   From the Desk of Janet Yelle
body:
Hello Janet Yellen,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update regarding my fund. However, before I proceed with providing any information, could you please clarify a few things for me? 

Firstly, could you please explain why my fund was put on hold for the past months? I would like to understand the reason behind it.

Secondly, which authorized bank will be handling the release of my fund? It would be helpful to know the name and location of the bank.

Lastly, is there any specific process or documentation that I need to follow in order to ensure a smooth release of my fund? Please provide me with detailed instructions so that I can proceed accordingly.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Daniel
